name: Filter!
description:
Filter is a very lovely tiny game.
What you have to do is erase the falling color tiles.
While the more clear the color tiles, the higher the cumulative score will be.
Pay attention to random props, use them will give you a lot of help.

Game features:
◉ well-designed rules of the game!
◉ Step-by-step game rhythm!
◉ full of simple color sense of the game screen to help you relieve fatigue!
